name: Sujal Verdhan
description: Building a website is a bit like cooking: you follow the recipe, but somewhere along the way, an ingredient goes rogue. One element is too large, another refuses to align, and yet somehow, the final dish turns out just right. Itâ€™s all part of the process!

name: Divay Sharma
description: As web developers, we've all been there with margins. It's like trying to keep everyone in line, but there's always that one element insisting on pushing the boundaries just a little too far!
